com.heaton.bot
Class HTMLPage

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.HTMLPage
public class HTMLPage
extends java.lang.Object

The HTMLPage class is used to parse an HTML page and store that page, in a parsed form, in memory. are exchanged with a webserver. Copyright 2001-2003 by Jeff Heaton (http://www.jeffheaotn.com)

Version:
1.2
Author:
Jeff Heaton

Nested Class Summary

          A HTML parser callback used by this class to detect links, images and forms.

Method Detail

open

public void open(java.lang.String url,
                 javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback callback)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
Called to open a page and read it in. If null is specified for the callback, then the other methods in this class may be used to look at images, links and forms.

Parameters:
url - The URL to read.
callback - A callback class to handle the parse, or null to use the built in one.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
javax.swing.text.BadLocationException

                    throws java.io.IOException
Internal function called to start the parse.

Parameters:
callback - The callback object to use.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getHTTP

public com.heaton.bot.HTTP getHTTP()
Get the underlying HTTP object that was sent to the constructor.

Returns:
The underlying HTTP object.

getLinks

public java.util.Vector getLinks()
Get a list of all of the links from this page. If this is to be used then null must have been passed as the callback object to the open method.

Returns:
All links on this page.

getImages

public java.util.Vector getImages()
Get a list of all of the images from this page. If this is to be used then null must have been passed as the callback object to the open method.

Returns:
A list of all of the images on this page.

getForms

public java.util.Vector getForms()
Get a list of all of the forms from this page. If this is to be used then null must have been passed as the callback object to the open method.

Returns:
A list of forms.

          throws java.io.IOException

form - The form object to post.
